name: Russian Car Driver HD
description:
Play the most realistic driving simulator, VAZ 2108!
At your disposal is a huge Russian countryside and all its roads, where over time you'll learn how to drive like a pro!

* Take part in the race with local riders, learn to park, conquer impassable roads, drift, or plunge into the intriguing events of the game in story mode. A huge variety of modes are offered!

* Enjoy the modern graphics and effects. Also, thanks to the advanced physics of the game your vehicle is deformed by blows, and will feel different on the sand or asphalt.

* Advanced game settings allow you to completely customize the game by yourself. Suitable for fans of realistic arcade racing simulators.

* Unique huge, and lively enough destroy the surroundings! The police, traffic and animals create a feeling of living in the real world.

* Thanks to the huge selection of styles and colors of the machine you will be able to create a unique style!

* Game 6 radio stations will be enjoyed by everyone. Also for fans of BPAN, private radio station is provided in the game.

And much more is waiting for you. Get behind the wheel of the legendary VAZ 2108 right now!
